text:
Does anyone know why default modules wouldn't be showing up inside the blog post editor (e.g., image, rich text, header)? They do show up in the blog listing page editor.

Maybe they were hidden somehow? Or maybe this is by design?
Maybe intentionally because you can do all of that directly in the blog content with the WYSWIG editor??
Yea, that's what I was thinking.. I'm also having trouble seeing custom modules that contain rich text or text fields, maybe for related reasons.
I'll have to do some more testing. Couldn't find any real documentation on this.
Interesting, would be interested to know what you learn
I think it's what you said. As for the other issue, that one was just user error :sweat_smile:
